BAIBEL I TOK
SAMTING DISPELA INAP MEKIM LONG YU
YU TING YUMI INAP BILIP TRU LONG TOK BAIBEL I MEKIM?
Yes, i gat tupela as na yumi inap bilip olsem:
God i no laikim tru pen na hevi na pasin i no stret. Tingim samting God Jehova i bin pilim taim ol man i mekim pasin nogut tru long lain bilong em long bipo, long taim bilong ol man i bin raitim Baibel. Baibel i tok Jehova i bel hevi tru long “ol man husat i wok long subim ol [lain bilong em] i go i kam.”—Hetman 2:18.
God i nolaik tru long ol man husat i mekim pasin nogut long ol narapela. Olsem, Baibel i tok “pasin bilong kilim nating ol arapela man” em i pasin nogut tru long ai bilong em.—Sindaun 6:16, 17.
God i tingim tru yumi wan wan. Ol wan wan man i save gut long ol ‘pen na hevi i bin kamap long em,’ na Jehova tu i save!—2 Stori 6:29, 30.
Long rot bilong Kingdom Bilong Jehova, klostu nau em bai pinisim pen na hevi bilong olgeta wan wan man. (Matyu 6:9, 10) Tasol long nau, em i save mekim gut bel bilong ol man i wok long painim em.—Aposel 17:27; 2 Korin 1:3, 4.

Secretary General blong Penama i saspen
Public Service Commission hem i saspendem Secretary General blong Penama Province, Judah Garoleo.
Secretary General blong Public Service Commission, Jean Eyve Bibi, i talem se suspension blong Judah Garoleo, hemi folem sam alekesen we i bin ko akensem hem folem attitude mo fasin blong karemaot wok.
Mr Bibi i talem se i gat plante alekesen we i bin ko akensem Mr Garoleo.
“Taem Saeklon Harold hem i strike, instead blong hem i kodinetem ol rilif long Penama e
... (26 chars skipped) ... 
m i travel i kam long Vila,” Mr Bibi i talem.
“Narafala fomol komplen, i kam long Minister blong Trade, James Bule, we i talem se long taem blong ofisiel visit blong hem i ko long Ambae, Mr Garoleo i no bin stap blong welkamem hem.
“Narafala serious alekesen we i ko akensem hem, hem i folem disisen blong Council blong ol Minista blong riloketem bak Provincial Kavman Headquota long Penama we i stap long Loltong blong kobak long Saratamata. Mbe Mr Garaleo hem i slo blong implementem.”
Secretary Ge
... (26 chars skipped) ...
 Commission, i talem se bes long ol serious alekesen ia, Public Service Commission hem i saspentem hem blong 21 dei blong kivim taem long hem blong respon long ol alekesen ia.
Hem i talem se commission hem i bin risivim wan formal complen i kam long Director General blong Internal Affairs mo Director blong Dipatmen blong local otoriti.
Public Service Commission hem i bin sidaon long las wik Fraedei blong disaed long saspensen ia.
VBTC i no bin save kasem Mr Garoleo blong kasem respons blong hem.

Ol Fiji go sekim Snax faktori long Lae
OL teknikel opisa bilong Fiji na PNG i go long Lae asde (Trinde) long mekim Impot Risk Asesemen bilong Trukai Rais na Snax Bisket.
Oposisen Lida: Putim ol pailot go bek long wok
OPOSISEN Lida Don Polye i askim ol bod na menesmen bilong Air Niugini long putim sefti bilong ol pasindia o kastoma bilong balus i go pas, na putim ol 8-pela senia pailot i go bek gen long wok.
Maru wanbel long wok bilong Pomaleu
MINISTA bilong Tred, Komes na Indastri, Richard Maru, i salensim ol menesing dairekta na sif ekseketiv opisa (CEO) bilong ol kampani bilong gavman na arapela gavman ejensi long bihainim lidasip stail bilong pastaim Menesing Dairekta bilong Investment Promotion Authority (IPA), Ivan Pomaleu.

64 Bipo Moses na Aron i bin kaunim ol man bilong Israel long ples drai, klostu long maunten Sainai. Tasol nau i no gat wanpela bilong ol dispela lain i stap na Moses i kisim nem bilong ol. Nogat tru.
65 Bipo Bikpela i bin tokim ol olsem, “Olgeta dispela man bai i dai long ples drai nating.” Olsem na olgeta i bin dai pinis. Tasol Kalep, pikinini man bilong Jefune, na Josua, pikinini man bilong Nun, tupela tasol i no i dai.

Year Hem Born: 1971
Kantri Hem Kam From: Tonga
History: Iusim tumas drug, prison
LAEF BLO MI BIFOR
Famili blo mi from Tonga, wanfala kantri wea garem samting olsem 170 island, and hem stap lo south west Pacific. Lo Tonga mifala garem simpol laef nomoa, no eni paoa and mifala no garem trak tu. Bat haos blo mifala garem wata, and mifala feedim tu-thri kokorako. Taem mifala skul holiday, mi and tufala brata blo mi savve helpem dadi blo mifala for lukaftarem olketa garden blo mifala, mifala plantim 
... (2406 chars skipped) ... 
mi hapi for acceptim. Hem firstaem for mi lanem olketa promis lo Bible abaotem paradaes earth wea bae kamap lo future. (Aesaea 35:5-8) Gogo, mi luksavve for mekem God hapi, mi need for mekem olketa bigfala change. Mi luksavve hao Jehovah God bae no letem mi for stap lo niu world sapos mi still keepim olketa nogud wei blo mi. (1 Corinth 6:9, 10) Mi disaed strong for kontrolem wei blo mi for kros kwiktaem, mi disaed for lusim smoke and no iusim moa olketa drug and for no drunk.
Lo 1999, bifor mi f
... (2406 chars skipped) ...
ehovah, mi fit for kontrolem laef blo mi moa. Mi no savve steal nao from olketa narawan for baem olketa drug wea mi addict lo hem. Bat, mi trae for helpem olketa neiba blo mi for kamap fren blo Jehovah tu. Thru lo wei wea mi associate witim olketa Jehovah’s Witness, mi meetim waef blo mi, Tea. Mitufala garem wanfala son and famili blo mifala hapi tumas. Mifala savve waka tugeta for teachim olketa narawan wanem Bible talem abaotem hope for laef olowe lo future lo wanfala paradaes wea garem peace.

Bisnis Link Pasifik (BLP) hemi praod blong spotem ol bisnis advaesori profesonal blong kasem wan bigfala odiens mo i konekt wetem ol niufala klaen. Long Vanuatu, BLP i patna wetem Vanuatu Jemba blong Komes mo indastri (VCCI) blong mekem bisnis sapot netwok i kam moa strong mo sapotem ol smol kasem medium entapraes (SMEs) long Vanautu.
Dijitol transfomesen hemi wan niufala buzz toktok blong bisnis long Pasifik. Long wik ya yumi harem long BLP kantri patna Savvy Vanuatu, we i atendem 2019 Pasifik 
... (1978 chars skipped) ... 
g faenansol teknoloji revolusen long Vanuatu, AJC oli promotem ol benefit blong SMEs we klaod bes akaonting sofwea hemi dilivarem. AJC hemi oferem wan seves we mane blong hem i stap daon blong setap maegresen mo tening blong klaod bes bisnis solutsen olsem Xero, we naoia BLP hemi sabsidaesem.
Damien Mullins, AJC Akaonting mo Odit Senia Maneja i talem se, Ol advaesa blong “AJC’s Xero oli setifae fulwan mo pasonet long olsem wanem nao Xero hemi save helpem blong transfomem SMEs.”
“Xero hemi givim 
... (1978 chars skipped) ...
va. Klosap nomo oli no save wok so mifala i wantem blong provaedem bigfala ICT solusen long plante man Vanuatu.
Bisnis Link Pasifik i talem bigfala wom konkratulesen i go long evri Pasifik ICT awod wina!
Blong moa infomesen mo blong lukim sapos bisnis blong yu hemi elijibol blong BLP sabsaedi o blong karem wan fri BLP bisnis helt jekap, kontaktem Yvonne Leo Taiki long Vanuatu Jemba blong Komes mo Indastri (VCCI) via Vanuatu@bisnislinkpasifik.com o kolem daerek long 7790124 o via VCCI long 27543.

Ol risk
- Stil blong infomesen blong ol kastoma, olsem ol adres mo peimen kad ditel.
- Jenisim fes blong websaet – wetem ol pikja mo mesej we oli no stret, we oli spolem ol man, oli showemaot heit o teroris.
- Ol atak blong dinael blong sevis tru long ol kriminol we oli stap traem blong spolem wok blong bisnes blong yu, blong garem mani.
- Damej long bisnes nem blong yu.
- Websaet i feil from infrastrakja o ol isiu wetem pawa saplae.
- Wan dinael blong sevis (DoS) we oli minim blong mekem o wan 
... (295 chars skipped) ... 
ng sistem ia. No livim eni paswod i set long defol valiu blong hem.
- Mekem sua se seva hem i gat proteksen we i kam long wan strong faeawol mo intanet sekuriti sofwe.
- Wokem jekem gud ol log fael blong kasem eni man we i wantem stap gat akses lo hem.
- Yusum letes vesen blong eni iComes sofwe. Ol olfala vesen i save gat ol wiknes we ol haka i save yusum.
- Dilitim ol websaet we oli nomo wok, mekem olsem taem yu askem host kampani i tekem olgeta i go daon mo dilitim evri fael.
- No mas storem p
... (295 chars skipped) ...
ave mo ol tul blong protektem bisnes blong yu.
- Tingbaot blong yusum wan profesenol penetresen fem blong testem ol sekuriti we i stap long iComes seva blong yu.
Sapos yu stap yusum wan nara kampani olsem hosting provaeda blong yu:
- Mekem wan reviu long sekuriti blong hem mo aveilebiliti polisi mo ol arenjmen.
- Jekem se sevis level agrimen ia i stret long ol nid blong yu.
- Bagegen, tingbaot blong yusum wan profesenol penetresen fem blong testem ol defens long seva blong host kampani blong yu.

Long last atikel[Wanem blong mekem taem Kot i entarem wan jajmen agensem yu] yumi tokbaot ol step we yu save tekem taem Kot i entarem wan jajmen agensem yu. Nao wan long ol wei we Kot I save entarem wan jajmen agensem yu hemi tru long Samari Jajmen we yu save luk long Rul 9.6 blong Civil Procedure Rules.
Rul ia hemi givim raet long Klema blong mekem wan aplikesen mo askem long Kot blong i entarem wan samari jajmen agensem difenden sapos hemi luk se difenden i nogat wan strong difense mo i no nid
... (1705 chars skipped) ... 
n copi blong statemen ia long Klema 7 dei bifo deit we bae Kot i sidaon long hem. Klema i fri blong respon long swon statemen ia 2 dei bifo Kot i sidaon.
Sapos yu difenden , afta we yu risivin aplikesen ia, yu askem long loia blong yu, o yu nomo sapos yu nogat wan loia, blong faelem ol pruf we i sapotem kes blong yu kwicktaem long Kot. Yu mas tekem ol gud mo strong pruf we i sapotem kes blong yu. Yu mekem sua se yu poentemaot ol samting we Klema i talem be yu no agri long hem. Olgeta samting ia 
... (1705 chars skipped) ...
ng askem advaes. Long evri Kot kes, aksen blong yu blong mekem se kes i no finis hariap i save afectem desisen blong Kot.
DISCLEMA: Hemia wan ligel spes wea yu save faenem ol besic infomesen abaot loa mo olsem wanem Kot i wok. ol infomesen ia oli no ligel advaes be oli stap blong helpem eniwan I andestanem wanem blo mekem.
sapos yu kat eni kwestin o nidim eni clarifikesen abaot ol infomesen ia yu save raet i kam long (vanuatulaw@gmail.com) o visitim websaet blong mifala long (www.pawthelaw.info)

Vanuatu Netball Association i holem wan helt awareness long Onesua
Wan helt awareness blong COVID 19 mo Non-Communicable Disis i tekem ples long Onesua Presbyterian College long tete.
Hemi toktok blong Virginia Taravaki, kaontri Coordinata blong Vanuatu Netball Assoication.
“So mifala i tokbaot COVID 19 mo efekt blong Non-Communicable Disis blong save givhan long olketa long hao blong stap sef,” hemi talem.
“Mifala i signem wan contract tu wetem Onesua Skul blong sitemap wan sub-association blong netball mo ranem olketa trening wetem ol tija mo studen.”
Mrs Taravaki i talem se ol studen ia i bin listen wetem bigfala interes mo tu pat long sam fun activiti we association blong netball i ranem.
Hemi talem se association emi stap luk fowud tu blong hostem sam even long ol manis we i stap kam.

Pol i no stop blong tokbaot bilif blong hem, nating se hem i stap long kalabus. Taem hem i stap long wan sip, hem i prij long ol boskru mo long ol man we oli stap long sip. Afta we sip i rek long Molta, i sua se hem i tekem janis blong prij long ol man we hem i hilim olgeta. Tri dei afta we hem i kasem Rom, hem i singaotem ol haeman blong ol man Jiu oli kam wanples blong i prij long olgeta. Mo blong tu yia we hem i kalabus long wan haos, hem i prij long evri man we oli kam visitim hem.
?Yu save mekem wanem blong yu gohed blong prij, nating se i gat sam samting we i blokem yu?

Traffik na Kago seksen bilong mipela save wok klostu wantaim ol pasindia long lukim olsem ol wantaim olgeta kago bilong ol kamap orait long wanem ol wanwan ples ol go kam long ol. Ol woklain lo Traffik save halivim ol pasindia taim ol checkin na sikelim kago long ol ples balus na kalap long balus bihain givim nem bilong ol pasindia (ol kolim manifest) i go long Flight Operations bilong mipela.
Dispela ol pepa wok i halivim mipela long lukim olgeta kastoma hamamas long kalap wantaim mipela, kamap orait tasol wantaim ol kago bilong ol na halivim ol taim ol sukuruim moa yet i go long ol narapela ples tu. Ol Kago seksen bai lukluk long ol kago bilong ol pasindia stap orait tasol taim mipela karim go kam na ron long taim tu.

PLANTI ol pusi em ol man i lukautim i save raun long nait. Olsem na mausgras bilong ol i save helpim ol long lukim ol samting na painim kaikai taim ples i go tudak.
Tingim: Mausgras bilong ol pusi i save gro long pes bilong ol. Olsem na ol nev i stap aninit long skin i helpim ol long pilim ol samting em ol i no inap lukim, olsem win samting. Na maski ples i tudak ol inap painim ol samting.
Mausgras bilong ol pusi i helpim ol long pilim ol samting, olsem na ol inap save long ples stret em wanpela samting o animal i stap long en. Na tu, mausgras bilong ol i helpim ol long luksave long sais bilong ol samting. Buk Encyclopædia Britannica i tok: “Ol saveman i mekim yet sampela wok painimaut long mausgras bilong ol pusi. Tasol ol i luksave olsem sapos ol man i katim mausgras bilong ol pusi, ol bai i no inap long raun bilong painim kaikai samting.”
Ol saientis i wokim ol robot i gat ol liklik sensa masin i mekim wankain wok olsem mausgras bilong ol pusi. Ol dispela liklik masin i helpim ol robot long muv i go i kam insait long wanpela rum maski i gat planti samting i stap. Ol i kolim ol dispela masin sensa olsem e-whiskers. Wanpela saientis long University of California long Berkeley, em Ali Javey i tok: “Ol man i ting ol i ken yusim ol dispela sensa long ol nupela masin, ol kompiuta, na tu, long ol wok saiens samting.”
Yu ting wanem? Mausgras bilong ol pusi i kamap long rot bilong evolusen? O wanpela i bin wokim?

Walfare officer long Department blong labour, Sonny Kalman hemi kam in long Studio long Radio Vanuatu blong tokbaot wakbaot weh hemi bin mekem igo long Ostralia.
Hemi bin mit wetem ol kaontri liaison officer weh stap long Ostralia mo ol wokman mo harem ol isu weh oli stap fecem.
Ol isu olsem rapis behavia, consum tumas alkol, isu blong ol kapol mo nara mo.
Wan kola weh hemi pat long diskasen blong tedei hemi kol long layba blong mas lukluk gud ol wokman fastaem befo sendm olgeta iko long sisenol wok.
Kola ia hemi highlightem tu famli isu weh istap kam long prokram ia mo kol blong leyba hemi luk luk long isu ia seriesli.
David Patunvanu hemi talem seh oli stap kasem repot tu lo sam rapis behavia weh sam sisenol woka long Ostralia oli stap mekem.
Beh Vanuatu hemi tekem one step ia nao blong putum kaontri liaison ofisa long Ostralia weh oli stap blong answerem ol wari blong ol wokman taem oli stap long prokram.
Sonny Kalman hemi kol long ol wokman blong mekem gudd use long prokram ia from hemi benefitim indivdual mo tu economi tru long ol remitiens.
Long Ostralia namba blong ol wokman blong Vanuatu hemi ova long 6,000.
Hemi seken long ol wokman blong Fiji weh stap long Ostralia.

Parliament namba 11 Palamen blong Papua New Guinea i tede makim Pangu Pati lida, James Marape gen olsem Praim Minista blong kantri unopposed.
Pastaim long eleksen blong Praim Minista, Palamen i electim Memba blo Manus and Pangu Pati Memba, Job Pomat, olsem Speaker blo Parliament na em bai ronim ileksen blong Praim Minista..
Namba wan sindaun blong namba 11 Parliament i bin sapos long stat long 10am tete morning tasol emino bin sidaun inap long 1:30pm tete avinun.
Displa delay em long wetim gen sampla moa writ we i sapos lo kam long han blong Clerk bllong Parliament bipo long Parliament iken sindaun tete morning.

Written by Capital on October 7, 2020
Ova long 15 jif raon long Sanma provins tugeta wetem ol hed blong ol tribe blong ol vilij long Santo rural oli saenem sam resolution blong talemaot se ol jif mo komuniti oli kat full paoa blong tekem decision blong managem ol conservation area long village blong olgeta.
Afta long wan bigfala summit we i bin tekem ples long olboe village, south west Santo wetem department blong environment, cultural senta mo ol chiefs mo heds tribe, miting i kam blong faenemaot se raorao blong graon I contribute bigwan blong damagem environment blong Santo mo taem gavman I step inside long area we I kat dispute, gavman I invest from mani nomo mo destroyem environment.
Ol jif mo hed tribe blong Santo oli saenem 15 resolution everiwan mo askem se everi area mo komuniti long Santo bambae oli setemap wan wan conservation area we hemi jif mo komuniti nomo i managem mo department blong environment long gavman wetem cultural senta oli stap blong assist nomo.
Santo bambae hemi fes Aelan we bambae I kat own conversation area long bush, riva mo solwota mo hemia I minim se long fiuja, aelan blong Santo bambae I kat ova 15 conservation area we bambae oli managem long way blong kastom blong wan vilej.

feksen blong keis,” Mr Sikon i talem.

... (326 chars skipped) ...

Laplap
Hao blong mekemEdit
Igat ol defdefren kaen laplap long Vanuatu. Samfala yu tekem yam, samfala taro, o maniok, o bresfrut; ale skrasem, skrasem go–go, pushum igo long bigfala lif olsem lif banana. Samtaem yu save adem fis tu, o spos no, mit blong buluk, o pig, o faol tu. Ale, skwisim melek blong kokonas igo long hem.
Kavremap evriwan wetem lif (banana lif o wanem), long smosmol bandel o sipos no long wan bigwan bandel wantaem. Finis ale, putum evriwan long stonoven, hemia oven we istap long graon, kavremap wetem hot ston; bekem. Taem hem tan finis, yu openem oven, tekemaot laplap.
Olgeta yusEdit
Oli bekem laplap olsemia blong bigfela grup i save sherem: olsem, long wan lafet blong vilej, wan maret, wan kastom seremoni, wan selebresen olsem.

asonal Referendum Committee we istap,” hemi talem.

fis mo Nasonal Committee blong helpem vot process blong Referendum.

Taem blong bigfala trabol i klosap, taswe wok blong prij i impoten tumas. (Pro 24:11, 12, 20) Yumi save givim kad blong JW.ORG blong pulum tingting blong man i go long Baebol mo long websaet blong yumi. Long kad ya, i gat wan code we i lidim man i go long video ya ?From Wanem Yu Mas Stadi Baebol? mo hem i save askem blong kasem moa save, no mekem Baebol stadi. Samfala oli no wantem karem ol buk blong yumi, be oli glad blong luk ol samting long websaet. Yumi mas givim wan kad long olgeta. Be yumi no mas lego kad ya wetem ol man we oli no intres.
Taem yu stap mekem ol wok blong yu evri dei, maet yu storian wetem sam man we yu save givim kad ya long olgeta. Yu save talem olsem: “Mi mi wantem givim smol kad ya long yu. Hem i tokbaot wan websaet we i gat plante save mo video long ol defdefren topik. Yu no pem blong daonlodem olgeta.” (Jon 4:7) Ol kad ya oli smol nomo, taswe yu save karem sam wetem yu oltaem.

Paslain liklik long Jisas i dai, em i tok: “Ol bai autim dispela gutnius bilong Kingdom long olgeta hap bilong graun na bai olgeta lain man i ken harim, na bihain long dispela, pinis bai kamap.” (Matyu 24:14) Tasol olsem wanem ol inap autim tok long olgeta hap? Long rot bilong bihainim pasin Jisas i soim taim em i stap hia long graun.
Mipela i laik bungim ol man long haus bilong ol. Jisas i skulim ol disaipel bilong em long autim gutnius long ol haus. (Matyu 10:
Mipela i laik bungim ol man long olgeta hap ol i stap long en. Jisas i stap gutpela eksampel tu long pasin bilong autim tok long ol man long ol pablik ples, olsem long nambis o long hulwara bilong komiuniti. (Mak 4:1; Jon 4:
Olsem wanem? Yu inap tingim wanpela man em yu laik serim gutnius bilong Kingdom Bilong God wantaim em na bai gutpela samting inap painim em long bihain? Orait, no ken pasim maus, kirap nau long autim dispela gutpela tok long ol narapela!
Wanem dispela “gutnius” mipela i mas autim?
Ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i mekim wanem bilong bihainim eksampel bilong Jisas long autim tok?

Long Sermon bilong Jesus long Maunten, hem sei: “No wari abaotem wanem iufala bae kaikaim and drinkim or wanem iufala bae werem.” (Mt 6:25). From iumi no perfect and iumi stap tu long world bilong Satan, iumi savve wari samfala taem bat Jesus talem olketa follower bilong hem for no wari tumas. (Sams 13:2) Why nao olsem? Bikos wei for wari nating nomoa abaotem olketa samting wea iumi needim evriday, savve stopem iumi for putim Kingdom olsem first samting long laef bilong iumi. (Mt 6:33) Nara samting wea Jesus talem bae helpem iumi for no wari nating.
Mt 6:26—Wanem nao iumi savve lanem taem iumi lukluk long olketa bird? (w16.07 9-10 par. 11-13)
Mt 6:27—Why nao wei for wari nating nomoa hem weistim taem and strong bilong iumi? (w05 11/1 22 par. 5)
Mt 6:28-30—Wanem nao iumi savve lanem from olketa flaoa long bush? (w16.07 10-11 par. 15-16)
Mt 6:31, 32—Long wanem wei nao olketa Christian difren from pipol long world? (w16.07 11 par. 17)
Wanem nao samfala samting wea mi laek stop for wari abaotem?

... (388 chars skipped) ...

Kol blong limit pasenja-PLTA
Public Land Transpot Otoriti i kol blong ol draeva i limitim namba blong ol pasenja long ol bus o pablik transpot.
Chief Executiv Ofisa blong Public Land Transpot Otoriti, Reginald Tabi, i talem toktok ia long VBTC Nius folem anaonsmen blong Minista blong Health, Honoroble Silas Bule long fes COVID-19 komuniti outbreak long Port Vila.
Mr Tabi i talem se ol draeva i sud werem mask mo stap seves naoia.
Hemi talem se i mas kat hand sanitazer tu long ol transpot o bus.
“Yumi ol draeva i mas yusum hand sanitazer taem yumi jensem mani,” Mr Tabi i talem.
“Mo ol pasenja tu i mas mekem pat blong olgeta blong werem mask taem oli kam insaed long ol bus o transpot.
“I mas kat limit namba blong ol pasenja long bus o transpot blong meintenem social distens. Ol draeva we oli stap seves ia oli mas tekem wetem olgeta ol COVID-19 vaccination kad from bae ol Polis mo Vanuatu Mobile Force Ofisa i stap long ol jek poin blong jek. Yu we yu no tekem stik meresin yet, yu mas kobak long haos mo wet blong tekem stik bifo yu stat seves.
Mr Tabi i askem ol draeva blong dropem off ol pasenja kwiktaem bifo 6pm from hemi ol taem we muvmen i stop.

Nesenal General Eleksen blong Papua New Guinea inau wok long pinis, wantem moa long 100pla ol writs we gobek pinis long Electoral Commission blong kantri.
Electoral Commissioner Simon Sinai itok klia long Tuesday olsem igat 4pla ol electorate or kounting we i wok long ron yet long displa taim na emi bilip olsem oli bai pinisim ol klostu taim.
Mr Sinai itok klia olsem maski em na ol woklain blong em i hamamas long lukim olsem ibin gat sampla gutpla samting we i kam aut long displa eleksen, ol tu i lainim sampla ol lesson we oli laik lukim wok stretim long em bipo long nex eleksen.
Long audio bai yu harim ABC ripota, Belinda Kora ibin stori wantem Mr Sinai long wanem em ol samting emi nau wok long en na ol electorate we i ronim yet eleksen blong ol.

Ikat inkris blong namba blong mental helt kes long kaontri.
Tim blong mental helt long Vila Central Hospital (VCH) hemi konfemem problem ia wetem VBTC Nius.
Olgeta expert i talem se mental helt long Vanuatu hemi involvem pipol blong eni grup mo age. Hemi wan silent problem we plante pipol istap lukim.
Ofisa injaj long Mental Health Unit long VCH, Lawrence Hinge, hemi talem se ikat inkris blong mental health siknes hemi from oli nokat akses long mental helt seves mo oli nokat wan kudfla connectio
... (247 chars skipped) ... 
 mo baondri blong olgeta,” Mr Hinge i talem.
“Wanem we mifala i mekem, mifala trainem ol komuniti lida long ol eria weh ol pasient oli stap slip long hem, so komuniti ya bae hemi identifiem ol parent we oli lukoutm olgeta, mo olgeta bae oli karem pasient hemi kam long mifala, bae mifala luk ale mifala stap mekem ol follow up long pasient blong helpem hem.
“Be otherwise blong mifala fosem pasient blong karem hem i kam, mifala no wantem brekem relationship we mifala kat ya wetem pasient, or bae pa
... (247 chars skipped) ...
 kompea long ol bigfala kaontri.
“From nomo se yumi no wantem kipim wan man or wan pasient long wan spes we blong bae hemi misim relationship we hemi bin kat wetem famli blong hem, sapos yumi brekem daon coneksen ya, then lo nata end bae pasient hemi stap developem wan difren samting bakeken,” Mr Hinge i talem.
Hemi addem tu se ikat shortej blong spes, mani mo inokat inaf human resos.
Wetem hemia, tim hemi tingbaot tu World Mental Health Dei we hemi stap tekem ples evri yia long namba 10 Oktoba.

Kol blong rimuvum kwiktaem Big Sista ship
Lamap Marine Conservation i kol long ona blong ship, Big Sista blong rimuvum kwik taem vessel ia.
Big Sista i bin wreck long Tuesday wik ia insaed long eria blong Lamap Marine Conservation long Saot Malekula.
Lamap Komuniti i askem strong long ona blong vessel, Big Sista o Kavman blong rimuvum ship ia kwik taem long eria ia.
Chairman blong Lamap Marine Conservation, Joseph Soksok, i talem se vessel ia i bin mekem bigfala damej long conservation eria ia.

na blong ship blong lukluk long damej ia long we i spolem,” Hemi talem.
“Bambae ol jif long komuniti i sitaon blong raetem wan leta i kam long Vila blong talemaot ol damej ia.”
Mr Soksok i talem se oli fraet tu sapos i gat eni leakage we i save kosem moa damej long eria ia.
Big Sista vessel i wreck i stap yet long eria ia sins Tuesday moning.
Supercargo blong ship Big Sista, Shem Tarson, i talem se hemi no save kivim komen long hao ship i bin reck.
Mr Tarson i talem se tete hemi namba tri dei we
... (418 chars skipped) ...
ing(Tuesday moning) kasem naoia ship i stap yet long Lamap, wan nara ship i kam pulum mbe from hemi smol mo rop i brok; ating bae oli mekem namba seven taem naoia,” Mr Tarson i talem.
“Mifala i stap sendem ol pikinini blong Santo i ko long Litzlitz blong oli ko long nara ship mo boss blong MV Big Sista bae i pem kost blem.”
Lamap Marine Conservation eria i kavremap wan eria blong 3kilomita we Lamap Landing i stap insaed long hem tu.
Lamap community i statem marine conservation eria ia long 2011.

Bae olketa herem wanfala tok wea bae storyim dae bilong Jesus and olketa blessing wea iumi bae kasem long future bikos long datwan. (Isa 11:6-9; 35:5, 6; 65:21-23; Joh 3:16) Bat iumi tu savve mekhae long Jehovah long datfala taem long wei for welkamim olketa wea kam. (Ro 15:7) Iumi savve duim thrifala samting hia.

Bihaen meeting hem finis iu savve ask sapos olketa garem eni kwestin. Sapos iu no garem inaf taem for story long olketa wea interest bikos nara kongregeson bae iusim Kingdom Hall, iu savve arrange for go lukim hem bihaen tu-thri day nomoa. Moa investikesen long MV Havatu
Ofis blong Maritime Regulator bae i mekem moa investikesen long ship Havatu taem hemi kasem Luganville.
Long wik ia ship ia i bin flaot long Ambae long eria blong Red Cliff wetem sam pasenja insaed.
Ofisa In-jaj long Ofis blong Maritime Regulator, Lloyd Fikiasi, i talem long VBTC Nius se wanem oli andastanem beis long ol maritime Regulator Ofisa long Santo se pump blong ship nao i nogud mekem se i nosave kulum enjin.
“Pump blong ship i brok daon mekem se enginia i
... (13 chars skipped) ... 
on enjin blong no mekem eni moa damej,”Mr Fikiasi i talem.
Long Wednesday moning tim blong Maritime Regulator long Santo wetem owna blong ship i bin sendem wan ship St Raphael we hemi blong semak owna nomo wetem wan pump. Oli kasem long Ambae, oli riperem pump ia mo MV Havatu i kontinu long seves blong hem i ko long Pentecost.
“Infomesen we yumi kasem se evri pasenja mo cargo oli oraet nomo. Mo yumi talem tankiu long rispon blong tim blong yumi long Santo mo owna blong ship.”
Wan social media po
... (13 chars skipped) ...
a, i kol blong kwik sapot from sins Wednesday moning, ol mama mo ol pikinini i stragol from sun i strong tumas mo wota i nomo kat.
Mr Fikiasi i talem sori long ol pasenja we oli bin travel long ship ia.
“Wan samting mifala long maritime i traem blong impruvum hemi sefti mo seves blong shipping industry,” Mr Fikiasi i talem.
“Hemia bae i tekem taem lelbet mbe wetem sapot blong Kavman we yumi kat naoia mifala i luk wan gudfala saen blong impruvum sekta ia.”
MV Havatu i beis long Luganville, Santo.

Delivery blong fes wok blong Vanuatu Government National Emergency Radio Network I stap kohed finis.
Wok blong mekem delivery mo setemap ol masin blong National Emergency Radio Network, ia ol ofisa blong Vanuatu Police force mo ol police ofisa blong Australia tru long Defence Cooperation Program I stap mekem.
Project ia, emi wan 3 yia project blong mekem se I kat gudfala strong communication network blong helpem wok blong police mo tu help long taem we wan disasta I kilim ani aelan long Vanuatu.
Team oli stap wok naoia long sam aelan finis blong mekem gud mo leftemap ol emergency radio network mo tu putum ol niufala HF mo VHF radio blong pipol I save yusum.

CEO blong Malvatumauri national kansel blong ol Jif, Jean Pierre I talem se ol jif I hapi mo sapotem wok we gavman tru long Dipatment blong Turisim I stap mekem blong faenem wan niu rod blong turism.

Hevi ren long Vanuatu yet
Vanuatu bae i stil expektem hevi ren long wik ia.
Franky Peter, Duty Weta Forecasta long Meteo Dipatmen, i talem long VBTC Nius long tete se hemia i folem tu low presa.
Mr Peter i talem se wan low presa i stap long saot blong Solomon Islands mo nara wan long saot blong New Caledonia.
“Yumi kat wan low presa tu long Saot blong Solomon Islands we i sud muv i long kaontri long Thursday,” Mr Peter i talem.
“Wiken ia ren i sud stap yet. Naoia janis blong i kam wan saeklon i stap low yet kasem thursday o Friday pa yumi faenemaot.
“Weta we i stap naoia i kos tru long wan nara low presa we i bin stap ova long yumi mbe naoia i muv i ko long Saot New Caledonia.
“Yumi long Vanuatu i stil expektem klaod kondisen mo isolate hevi renfol wetem woning blong hevi ren tu i stap yet.
Mr Peter i advisem ol pipol se Vanuatu i stap long Saeklon sisen mo pipol i mas rere oltaem.
“January, February mo March hemi oltaem blong category faev saeklon,” Mr Peter i talem.
“Ol pipol we oli stap kolosap long ol riva o eria we i low bae i stil experiencem flood.”

Gudfala waef bae mekem pipol tinghae long hasband bilong hem. Long taem bilong King Lemuel, gudfala waef savve mekem “staka pipol savve long hasband bilong hem long olketa gate long taon.” (Pr 31:23) Long distaem, pipol respectim olketa elder and ministerial servant. Sapos olketa marit, wei wea olketa fit for duim disfala waka hem depend tu long gudfala wei and sapot bilong waef bilong olketa. (1Ti 3:4, 11) Olketa hasband wea garem gudfala waef tinghae long waef bilong olketa, and olketa long kongregeson tu.
Gudfala waef helpem hasband for duim waka long kongregeson taem hem . . .
encouragem and tok kaen long hem.—Pr 31:26
sapotim hasband taem hem helpem olketa narawan long kongregeson.—1Th 2:7, 8
satisfae long wanem famili garem.—1Ti 6:8
no askem hasband for talem hem olketa samting wea olketa elder nomoa shud savve.—1Ti 2:11, 12; 1Pe 4:15

LONG nau i gat planti narapela narapela tokples, klostu olsem 7,000 tokples long graun olgeta. Na dispela inap mekim na i hatwok long ol man i raun i go long narapela ples, mekim wok bisnis, kisim ediukesen na mekim wok gavman. Kirap long bipo yet dispela hevi i stap. Olsem, long 475 B.C.E. samting taim King Ahasuerus (ating em Serksis Namba 1) i bosim Persia, em i salim ol pas long “olgeta ofisa bilong ol 127 provins, stat long India na i go inap long Itiopia. Dispela pas ol i raitim long ol tok ples bilong olgeta provins na long tok ples bilong ol Juda.” *
Long nau planti oganaisesen na ol gavman i no inap long mekim kain bikpela wok bilong trensletim ol buk na nius samting. Tasol i gat wanpela oganaisesen i mekim gut dispela wok, em ol Witnes Bilong Jehova. Ol i save wokim ol buk na nius, ol odio na vidio rekoding, na tu, ol i trensletim Baibel na planti narapela buk i go long winim 750 tokples. Na tu, ol i trensletim klostu 80 narapela narapela tokples Sain bilong ol yaupas. Ol Witnes i wokim tu kain kain buk long rait Brel bilong helpim ol man i aipas.
Ol Witnes Bilong Jehova i no save mekim wok bisnis long ol wok ol i mekim. Na tu, ol trensleta na ol arapela lain i wok long ol ofis bilong ol i mekim wok olsem ol volantia. Bilong wanem ol i givim bel long trensletim ol buk na nius samting i go long planti tokples? Na hau ol i mekim dispela bikpela wok?

Palemen Fes Extra Ordinary Sitting i muv-Friday
Palemen Fes Extra Ordinary Sitting i muv i ko long Friday from i nokat namba.
I kat 27 Memba blong Palemen nomo i presen long Palemen jemba tete moning mo i nidim two third majoriti blong kontinu long bisnis blong hem we hemi 34.
Speaker blong Palemen, Simeon Seule i saspendem Palemen sitting ia blong tri dei blong tokbaot ol mosen we karemaot tu yia saspensen blong Malekula Memba blong Palemen, Gracia Shadrack, eleksen blong ol niu deputi spika mo mosen blong nokat trast akensem Prime Minista.
“Folem atikol 21 long constitution blong Republic blong Vanuatu, moning ia yumi nosave ko hed from i nogat korom mo Palemen bae i jes mit nomo afta long tri dei we hemi Friday long 8;30am,” Mr Seule i talemaot.
VBTC Nius i kasem infomesen se Presiden blong Republic blong Vanuatu, His Excellency Vurobaravu i no mekem eni disisen yet long rikwes blong Prime Minista, Bob Loughman long disolusen blong Palemen.

Charles-Edouard Jeanneret-Gris (nem bilong yuwei), (6 October 1887 – 27 August 1965), em i wanpela arkitek na raita i bin birua long Suwisalan. Long 1930s, em i baim wanpela sitisen blong Frens. Em i wanpela man i bekim bikpela namba bilong em long dispela hap bilong modernism long arkitek. Plen blong em i inkludim pemsel bilong mekim haus long ol pipol long bikpela siti mas gat gutpela kain yumi i bin kisim. Dispela i bikos planti pipol i stap bungim long tupela taim. Ol desain blong em i bin mekim bikpela long ol hap bilong dispela wol.

Mr Salwai i bin statem kes ia long las yia kasem general eleksen blong 2020 mo long yestede nao jajmen i kamaot.

Long sem taem Pacific Games hem gogohet long Honiara, olketa ofisa blong samfala gavman dipatmen olketa gohet tu fo karem aot awareness long ban or stopem ius blong samfala kaen single-use plastic long Solomon Islands.
Long Septemba iet long disfala yia, Gavman hem gazettim or officially mekem hem lo finis fo banim import, mekem long faktori, distribiutim, saplaem and fo salem olketa samting olsem plastic shopping bags, straws, cups, plates, samting fo kakai wetem and samfala plastic samting moa.
Diswan hemn part blong disfala Pacific Ocean Litter Project (POLP) wea Gavman blong Australia nao hem givim selen fo hem thru long Secretariat blong Pacific Regional Environment Programme (SPREP)...wea hem sapotim tu nasinol regulesen blong Solomon Islands and wanem olketa kolem 'Greening of the 2023 Pacific Games' long Honiara.
Anda long disfala ban, olketa manufacturers, distributors, and suppliers blong olketa single-use plastic products ia olketa garem siks manis kasem namba 1 March 2024 fo endim olketa kaen bisnis ia.
Waste Management seksen blong Ministry blong Health and Medical Services tu hem involve long disfala kampen long Games long Honiara, and niusmere Chrisnrita Aumanu Leong hem stori wetem wanfala team memba blong olketa, Josh Tuai.

Moa ren -Weta ofis
Vanuatu bae i expektem moa ren long ol manis we i kam folem wet sisen we bae i hapen blong nambatri taem long yia ia.
Climate Division Ofisa, Allan Rarai i talem long VBTC Nius long tete.
Mr Rarai i talem se long septemba 13 2022, ol aelan blong vanuatu i stat finis blong luk plante rain. Hemia i minim nomo se
rain we bae i foltaon bae i no semak olsem ol nomol rain fol from bae i moa.
Hemi talem se Vanuatu bae i fesem bakeken namba tri time long yia ia, La nina we bae i save hapen.
“Rainy sisen we vanuatu i stap ko tru long hem, hemi long manis blong October, November mo December, be La Nina we yumi i stap
fesem nao ia, hemi hapen aotsaed long nomol sisen,” Mr Rarai i talem.
“”Ol bigfala rain olsem we i stap hapen long ol aelan blong yumi long Vanuatu fulap taem, i mekem ol pipol oli save gud olgeta impact we rain i save kosem olsem flad, lanslaet mo
sam narafalal impak.
“” Taem i kat wan la nina, i save mekem namba blong saeklon i inkris, mo long past experiens fulap saeklon i fom.
“Ol kaen event blong La Nina olsem i bin stap hapen finis bifo i kam. Hem i talem se event blong la nina ia i bin hapen long 2020 kasem 2021, 2021 kasem 2022 mo 2022
bae i stap kasem 2023.”
Mr Rarai i talem se ol infomesen olsem hemi impoten blong ol pipol blong Vanuatu oli mas save.
by Ezra Toara, Trainee Journalist.

Papua New Guinea gavman imas igat gutpla plen pastaim long em iken go het long surukim wok long Pacific Marine Industrial Zone pak long Madang provins.
PNG Fishing Industry Association President, Sylvester Pokajam itok tu olsem ol toktok nau long kamapim wanpla moa fishing plant long Daru long Western provins em ol mauswara toktok na bai no inap karim kaikai.
Em itok Daru ino ples blong ol imekim bikpla komesel fishing na gavman imas strongim wokbung na polisi long Madang wantaim lokol gavman na ol pipol long kirapim PIMZ long provins.
Toktok blong PIMZ ibin stat long 2004 na long 2019, ananit long foma praim minista Peter O'Neill, gavman ilaik kisim dinau moni mak long $US168 million long mekim wok long hap tasol ibin stop.
Las yia PNG gavman itoktok gen long wankain divelopmen long Daru we mak long $204 million bai go insait long divelopim tasol displa tu igat planti tok pait istap yet longen.

Santo copra fama i lusum hom
Wan 74 yia copra fama long Cape Quiros, North East Santo i lusum tu haos long faea folem isiu blong graon long wiken.
Polis Noten Koman i konfemem insiden ia se fama ia i lusum tu VT1.4 million kas mani long faea.
I kat alekesen se olgeta pipol we oli komitim ofens ia, oli bin mekem wan sale blong graon blong tufala olfala couple ia we estimate eria blong hem i kasem 1600 hekta i ko long wan Chinese man, mo bihaen treatenem tufala blong aot.
Wan nara haos blong apu blong tufala i damej from ol semak pipol ia oli terem daon.
VBTC Nius tim long Northern Town i kasem toksave long Vanuatu Police Northern Command ofis se oli bin atendem scene blong insiden long semak wiken blong witnesem damej mo toktok wetem ol witness mo kes i stap long han blong Polis.
Polis i askem pipol blong stap kwaet mo no tekem loa long han blong olgeta mo aloem police investikesen i gohed.

Ansa we Baebol i givim
Yes. Ol rabis spirit oli ol ‘enjel we oli mekem sin,’ oli rebel agensem God. (2 Pita 2:4) Faswan enjel we i mekem hem wan i kam wan rabis spirit, hemia Devel Setan, we Baebol i singaot hem se “jif blong ol rabis spirit.”—Matiu 12:24, 26.
Oli Mekem Stronghed Long Taem Blong Noa
Baebol i tokbaot se taem Bigfala Wota long taem blong Noa i no ron yet, sam enjel oli rebel agensem God. Hem i se: “Ol pikinini blong tru God oli stat blong lukluk ol gel blong ol man, oli luk we oli naes. Nao oli go tekem olgeta gel ya we oli jusumaot, blong oli waef blong olgeta.” (Jenesis 6:2, NW) Ol rabis enjel ya oli “lego prapa ples blong olgeta” long heven, oli jenisim bodi blong olgeta i kam bodi blong man, nao oli slip wetem ol woman ya.—Jud 6.
Taem Bigfala Wota i ron, ol stronghed enjel ya oli jenisim bodi blong olgeta bakegen, nao oli gobak long heven. Be God i ronemaot olgeta blong oli no moa joen long famle blong hem. Wan narafala panis blong olgeta se, bambae oli neva save jenisim bodi blong olgeta bakegen blong oli kam man.—Efesas 6:11, 12.

Long toktok blongem long nation Tuesday, Praem Minista Salwai itok kantri bae fesim hard taem taem ol narafala kantri long rijin mo long world putim ol measures blong stopim spred blong sik ia.
Mr Salwai hem se inogat yet wan keis blong Coronavirus long Vanuatu, mo hem preisim wok blong Taskforce we lukaotem wok blong stopem sik ia.
Hem se tenkiu tu long help blong World Health Organisation mo ol narafala gavman mo agencies we i helpem Vanuatu fo stopem spred blong coronavirus go long kantri.
Hem se fromwe ekonomi blong Vanuatu hem smol, bae hem filim hard long saet long big indastri blong kantri olsem turism.
Mr Salwai hem se beis long advice blong ol offisol, bae oli saspendim tu ol seasonal worker program, mo oli stopem ol cruise ship long go insaet long Vanuatu insaet long next 60 days.
Hem se ol Ni-Van mo ol grups imas lusim eni plan ol igat long go long ovasi insaet neks 60 days.
Caretaker praem minista hem askem tu cooperesen blong ol church mo komiuniti lida taem gavman i traem fo stopem spred blong coronavirus go insait long Vanuatu.

... (346 chars skipped) ...

Plenti ol i makim em olosem meri bilong wokim kalt, ol i tok olosem em bin workim sampela kain kastom ananait long diwai. g em, long courage bilong em, long determination na loyalty bilong em, long ol lo Yali bin wokim. God nao wakem iumi and hem tingim iumi. Wanfala dadi wea wise and wea lovem olketa pikinini hem teachim olketa. Long sem wei tu, God teachim pipol long evri ples mekem olketa savve kasem gud samting.
God helpem iumi for savve long olketa tru samting wea mekem iumi hapi and garem hope.
Sapos iu lisin long God, hem bae leadim iu, protectim iu, and helpem iu for savve wanem for duim taem iu kasem olketa problem.
Hem no datwan nomoa, bat iu bae laef olowe!

AUSTRALIA POLIS NA SOLDIA I KEN USIM "REASONABLE FORCE' LONG SOLOMONS
MELBOURNE, Australia (Radio Australia, July 14) - Bai oli larim ol soldia na polis bilong Australia long usim samting oli kolim "reasonable force" sapos oli usim ol long Solomon Islands.
Shane McLeod i ripot olsem, ating ol bai debate o toktok long loa em bai oraitim dispela intavensen fos taim paliment i sidaun dispela wik.
Australia gavman i bin halvim ol loia long raitim loa em bai givim tok orait long intanesanel fos bilong go insait.
Dispela loa bai sapotim tingting long bringim samting olsem tu-tausen polisman, soldia na ol narapela pipal bilong go long Solomons bilong stretim lo na oda.
Loa bai larim ol long makim ol pipal bilong arasait bilong ol wok, aninit yet long Solomons Police Act, taim em bai halvim ol tu long noken bungim heve long ol lokal lo sapos oli wokim rong taim oli stap long duti.
Insait long lo tu i gat ol toktok i karamapim wok bilong 'weapons surrender' - we pipal i givim bek gan bilong ol, na wok bilong rausim ol gan na samting bilong pait, na wok bilong review o galasim wok bilong intavensen fos olgeta tupela tupela yar.
July 15, 2003
Radio Australia: www.abc.net.au/ra

Wan kriminol investigesen i stap long folem olgeta alegesen se wan agrimen long jack makerel fishing raet blong Vanuatu i no valid from hemi no karem apruval blong gavman, Minista blong Foren Afea, Hon Marc Ati, i talem.
Vanuatu hem i karem wan kwota blong makerel fishing be anda wan agrimen, wan kampani hem i bin salem kwota ia i go long nara pati we i bin pem.
Be Hon. Ati i rilisim wan stetmen we i talem se i gat wan investigesen long agrimen ia from hem i no stret, mo i no kasem aprovol blong Kaonsel blong Minista.
Hon. Ati i talem se gavman i bilif se bae i gat arest long investigesen ia ino longtaem.
Mo gavman hem i bin go long Suprim Kot blong traem karem bak mane long wan tuna fishing kampani blong Vanuatu.
Gavman i talem se kampani ia i bin risivim mane we i mas go long Vanuatu.
Hon. Ati i talem se Vanuatu agrimen hemi wan “shocking” kes blong exploitasen mo wan injustis se Vanuatu i mas mekem stret.
Hemi talem se mackerel kwota hemi wan long ol importan resors blong Vanuatu.
Foma praem minista Hon Ishmael Kalsakau hemi bin resemap strong konsen blong hem long agreement ia long festaem we infomesen abaot agreement ia hemi kamap.

YIA MI BON: 1964
KANTRI: INGLAN
BIPO: YANGPELA MAMA, BIKHETMERI
LAIP BILONG MI LONG BIPO
Mi bon long Paddington em wanpela ples long London, Inglan na planti manmeri i stap long hap. Mi stap wantaim Mama na tripela bikpela susa bilong mi. Papa bilong mi em i man bilong dring, olsem na em i no save stap tumas wantaim mipela.
Taim mi liklik yet, Mama i skulim mi long beten long olgeta nait. Long dispela taim mi gat wanpela liklik Baibel i gat Buk Song tasol, na mi kamapim ol musik na bai mi ken si
... (2347 chars skipped) ... 
k Jisas i mekim long kirap bek! (Jon 5:28, 29) Na tu, mi kisim save olsem God i save tingim yumi wan wan. (1 Pita 5:7) Mi pilim moa yet tok bilong Jeremaia 29:11, em i tok: “Mi Bikpela, mi tingim pinis ol samting mi laik mekim bilong helpim yupela. Mi laik mekim gut long yupela. Mi no laik mekim nogut long yupela. Yupela i ken tingim ol dispela samting mi laik mekim, na yupela i ken wetim dispela taim i kamap.” Nau mi bilip na wet long kisim laip oltaim long paradais long graun.—Song 37:29.
Ol W
... (2347 chars skipped) ...
gim mipela.—Song 55:22.
Mi amamas long helpim tupela pikinini bilong mi long save long Jehova. Na tu, mi kisim wankain amamas long lukim ol tumbuna pikinini bilong mi i kisim save long God.
Nau mi no save tingting planti long ol samting bai kamap bihain na mi no pret long dai. Long olgeta wik, mi na Tony i givim bel long go visitim ol narapela kongrigesen bilong ol Witnes Bilong Jehova na strongim ol. Mipela i amamas long skulim ol narapela long bilip long Jisas na bai ol tu i kisim laip oltaim.

Oli save ditektem wijwan Maekrosof prodak yu stap ranem long kompiuta blong yu mo provaedem ol apdeit long olgeta tu. Witroel blong mosen blong nokat trust long Praem Minista mo mosen blong reinstatem Hon. Gracian Shadrak hemi ol main business weh i ko tru long flo tedei long palemen
Long palimen sitting yestete afenun, opposistion hemi witdrowem motion blong nokat trast akensem Prime Minista Charlot Salwai Tabimasmas follem promis blong olgeta weh oli bin mekem long state aos .
Opposistion hemi stap lukluk blong i wok kolosap wetem kavman blong lukluk long stability blong mekem sua seh inakreti bil hemi pas long plaimen mo semak taem lukluk tu long badget blong 2024.
Hemya nao hemi mein tingting long whae opposisition hemi kam in blong mekem disisen blong witrowem motion, from oli bilivim seh i benifitim olgeta pipol.
Wetem hemya, kavman saet hemi kam blong talem tu blong putum bak Gracian Shadrak blong oli saveh rimuvum suspension blong hem blong hemi saveh attendem palimen bakeken.
Palimen hemi bin saspen blong 5 minit blong diskasem olgeta wei fowod blong diskasem long palimen mo afta long hemya oli kam blong disaet mo spika blong palimen hemi adjonem palimen kasem Novemba 22 blong oli saveh kam diskas meinli long tufala mein samting weh hemi blong karem aot suspension blong MP Gracian Shadrak mo tu blong lukluk long badget blong 2024.
Hemy nao hemi wanem weh hemi hapen insaet logn Palimen long yestete 15 novemba 2023.

Gutpela meri i save stori long ol gutpela pasin bilong man bilong em. Long taim bilong King Lemuel, “ol hetman bilong ples i givim biknem long man” husat i gat gutpela meri. (Sd 31:23) Long nau, ol brata i gat gutpela nem i mekim wok olsem ol elda na ministerial sevan. Sapos brata i marit, orait em bai mekim gut wok sapos meri bilong em i gat gutpela pasin na i sapotim em. (1Ti 3:4, 11) Ol gutpela meri olsem bai amamasim man bilong ol, na kongrigesen tu bai amamas long ol.
Gutpela meri i save helpim man bilong em long mekim yet ol wok bilong em taim em i . . .
mekim ol gutpela tok bilong strongim man.—Sd 31:26
sapotim man long ol wok em i mekim insait long kongrigesen.—1Te 2:7, 8
amamas long ol samting em i gat pinis.—1Ti 6:8
no askim em long ol samting bilong kongrigesen we em i no gat wok long save long en.—1Ti 2:11, 12; 1Pi 4:15

Olketa Jehovah’s Witness iusim plande difren transleison taem olketa studyim Bible. Bat mifala barava tinghae long Niu World Bible, bikos hem garem nem bilong God insaed, hem stret, and hem isi for minim.
Garem nem bilong God insaed. Samfala Bible no mekhae long God, wea hem nao givim kam Bible long iumi. Olsem example, insaed long kava bilong wanfala Bible, olketa talem nem bilong winim 70 man wea waka tugeta for transleitim and printim datfala Bible. Bat no eniwea insaed datfala Bible hem tale
... (360 chars skipped) ... 
, long Matthew 7:
13, wanfala Bible hem sei: “Go insaed long smolfala gate, bikos gate wea go long hell hem waed and road wea lead go long datwan hem isi nomoa for followim.” Bat word wea Matthew iusim taem hem raetem datwan hem “dae” no “hell.” Maet olketa transleita iusim datfala word “hell” bikos olketa garem biliv wea sei nogud pipol bae safa for olowe long hellfire. Bat datfala teaching no stap insaed Bible. Dastawe, Niu World Bible hem sei: “Go insaed long smolfala gate, bikos narafala roa
... (360 chars skipped) ...
t mekem iu hot.” From diswan no mek sense long Pijin, Niu World Bible hem transleitim long wei wea garem mining. Hem sei: “Letem spirit mekem iufala strong for duim waka.”
So Niu World Bible hem transleison wea garem nem bilong God insaed, and hem klia and stret. Bat nara important samting abaotem Niu World Bible nao, mifala no askem selen for hem. From diswan, staka million pipol savve readim Bible long languis bilong olketa, nomata tu, olketa wea poor and no garem selen for peim wanfala Bible.

Siamani
Siaman(i) oa Je(r)man(i) (Tok Inglis: Germany, Tok Siaman: Deutschland) emi wanpela kantri long Yurop.
Em i stap arere long kantri Pranis na Holan. Kampani na gavman bilong Siamani i bin bosim noten hap bilong Papua Niugini long taim bipo inap long yia 1914. Oli kolim dispela hap bilong Papua Niugini long dispela taim Siaman Niugini.
Siamani em i asples bilong Martin Luther na Albert Einstein.
Kapitol na bikpela taun bilong kantri emi Berlin.

POT MOSBI -Narapla yar blong resis long wilwil, swim na ron i pinis wantaim tupla Papua New Guinea i winim nambawan na namba tu trofi. Polehau Popelau i kamap namba tu displa yar resis. Em ibin winim kanu reis long Pokawins Cup long Manus we ol i makim em long trai long Triathlon and Cycle Championships long Port Moresby.
Wanpla long ol pipol i putim mak blongen long namba tri Pacific Triathlon and Cycle Championships long Papua New Guinea kepitol long wiken, em long Manus man, Polehau Popelau.
Man ibin winim dispela resis blong 2013 ibin go Lee Ressmussen blong Papua New Guinea. Marianne Elkington blong Cairns i kamap namba 3.
Displa win blong Papua New Guinea nao i min olsem PNG i stap namba wan, Guam namba tu, Fiji namba tri na Solomon Islands ikam long namba foa.
Wanpela long ol cyclist blong Papua New Guinea Polehau Popelau i tok kamap blongen long dispela resis i kamap long strong blongen iet.
"Mi wan save trein, mi wan save cycle na suim, mi save treinim mi eit long ples."
Long Port Moresby nao, long redim displa bikpla Pacific resis, mi joinim Port Moresby tim na joinim treinin blong ol."
Polehau Popelau i makim planti Papua New Guinea pipol, husait i laik mekim neim blong ol iet insait long sport blong ol, long iusim save na strong blong ol long winim sampla kaen luksave.
Long neks yar Triathlon resis long Guam, Polehau Popelau i tok, "mi mas go bek long treinin na putim bek neim blong PNG long hap," em ibin tok. [RedioAustralia]

Law bilong Moses sei man wea laek for divorce mas raetem wanfala pepa for divorce. Diswan savve stopem pipol for no kwiktaem divorce. Bat long taem bilong Jesus, olketa bigman bilong olketa Jew mekem hem isi nomoa for man savve divorce. Olketa hasband savve divorcem waef bilong olketa for enikaen reason nomoa. (nwtsty olketa study note long Mr 10:4, 11) Samting wea Jesus storyim showimaot Jehovah nao startim marit. (Mr 10:2-12) Jehovah sei hasband and waef bae kamap “wanfala body nomoa” and tufala bae stap tugeta for olowe. Long Matthew 19:9, Bible sei man savve divorce nomoa sapos marit partner “hem durong.”
Staka pipol distaem garem sem tingting olsem olketa Pharisee abaotem marit. Olketa no followim wanem Jesus talem. Taem problem kamap long marit, staka kwiktaem for divorce. Bat olketa Christian hasband and waef followim wanem Bible talem abaotem marit. Olketa waka hard for followim olketa Bible principle for stretem olketa problem bilong olketa. Bihaen iu lukim video Showimaot Love and Respect Insaed Marit, ansarem olketa kwestin hia:
Hao nao iu savve followim Provebs 15:1 long marit bilong iu, and why nao hem important?
Hao nao wei for followim Provebs 19:11 savve helpem iu for misstim olketa problem long marit?
Sapos iu kasem big problem long marit bilong iu and iu tingting for divorce, wanem nao samfala kwestin wea iu shud ting raonem?
Hao nao wei for followim Matthew 7:12 savve helpem iu for kamap gudfala hasband or waef?
